TASK: Craft an item of type: black_glazed_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "zombie_spawn_egg", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "turtle_egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 20}, {"type": "wither_rose", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 13, "index": 24}, {"type": "shulker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 26}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 28}, {"type": "clay", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 50, "index": 35}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 32, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft black_glazed_terracotta, I need to craft 9 black_terracotta. To craft black_terracotta, I need to craft 8 terracotta and 1 black_dye. To craft black_dye, I can use the wither_rose at slot 22. To craft terracotta, I need to smelt the clay at slot 32 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 32 to slot 12 with quantity 1
